entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 p.m. NDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 3:30 PM NDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Light Rain

Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 82 %

Wind: N 5 km/h
